casebody.data:
Richard Eugene GLOSSIP, petitioner,
v.
OKLAHOMA. No. 15-6340 (15A333). Supreme Court of the United States Sept. 30, 2015.

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice SOTOMAYOR and by her referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Criminal Appeals of Oklahoma denied.

Justice BREYER would grant the application for stay of execution.
